DOC.brief_summary: Safety and efficacy study in patients with acne vulgaris
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study in Patients With Acne Vulgaris.
DOC.detailed_description: randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled, parallel-group, multiple-center study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ADPS in the treatment of acne vulgaris.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or non pregnant female aged â‰¥ 9 years with a clinical diagnosis of acne vulgaris Female Subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning to become pregnant during study participation.
